name: Krista
desc:
Princess of the Medeas.
Idealistic, but rash.
fields: Aw, dammit. I thought I had that!

name: Forrest
desc:
Krista's retainer.
Devoted to his kingdom and liege.
fields: It seems I still have much to learn.

name: Kai
desc:
Studious sellsword from Merinas.
Krista's tactician.

name: Trevor
desc:
Former drifter who is now Krista's retainer.
Talkative and proud.

name: Chell
desc:
Captain of the Medean army's pegasus knights.
Acts motherly to her subordinates.

name: Sam
desc:
Strongman of the mountains.
Hates bandits with a passion.
fields: Heh, not bad. I gotta train harder!

name: Aqua
desc:
Cleric from Foliaga.
Kind-hearted and innocent.

name: Semi
desc:
Refugee from Medeas now living in Foliaga.
Hates the Medean royal family.
fields: Argh, I knew I was gonna lose{tgm}...

name: Taylor
desc:
Co-captain of the Medean royal army.
Charismatic and loud-mouthed.
fields: Man, that hurt{tgm}...{tgm} But hey, great match!

name: Alex
desc:
Co-captain of the Medean royal army.
Calm and tactical.

name: Lucy
desc:
Healer under employ of the Medean royal family.
Cheerful and energetic.
fields: Aw, I lost? Oh, well. That was still fun!

name: Ecco
desc:
Mercenary from Oregot.
Confident, but obnoxious.
fields: I just had an off day, that's all.

name: Anil
desc:
Former bandit turned mercenary from Oregot.
Observant, but mute.

name: Michael
desc:
New recruit of Foliaga's Holy Knights.
Anxious, but has a good heart.
fields: I should have never left home{tgm}...
I guess I should train more{tgm}...

name: Felicity
desc:
Krista's personal maid.
Mischevious and playful.
fields: This is so unfair{tgm}...!{tgm}|I'm sorry, Your Highness. I have to retreat{tgm}...!

name: Viola
desc:
Pegasus Knight in Medea's royal army.
Kind, but ditzy.
fields: Aw, man. Well, I had fun, at least!

name: Marina
desc:
Barmaid from Foliaga.
Sociable and free-spirited.
fields: The arena never was my venue of choice anyhow.

name: Joshua
desc:
A famous arena fighter.
Competitive and rowdy.

name: Azure
desc:
Dancer from Foliaga.
Elegant and fair.
fields: Sorry, Aqua{tgm}...{tgm} Big bro failed you{tgm}...
Never was one to take up arms anyway.

name: Rembrandt
desc:
Wandering swordsman from Fuegsol.
Stoic and introspective.

name: Anna
desc:
Traveling merchant from Oregot.
Outgoing and sharp.

name: Jake
desc:
Traveling merchant from Oregot.
Friendly and simple-minded.

name: Xiang
desc:
Diviner who lived in Foliaga's underground tunnels.
Not accustomed to social norms.
fields: What sort of entertainment do people get out of this{tgm}...?

name: Celeste
desc:
Young girl from Florene Village.
Has a strong sense of justice.
fields: Wait, wait, wait, I coulda done SO much better!

name: Parker
desc:
Medean nobleman and Krista's cousin.
Serious and studious.
fields: N-No{tgm}...!{tgm} I will have to{tgm}...{tgm} withdraw{tgm}...
Hm{tgm}...{tgm} It seems I still have much to learn.

name: Cole
desc:
Mage apprentice and Parker's protege.
Shy around strangers.
fields: I-I'm sorry, Mister Parker{tgm}...{tgm} I couldn't{tgm}...
I can do a lot better next time!

name: Ryuuji
desc:
Captain of the Wyrmfang Pirates.
Fatherly, but crude.
fields: The crew's not gonna let me hear the end of it if|they knew about this{tgm}...

name: Taiga
desc:
First mate of the Wyrmfang Pirates.
Loud and boisterous.
fields: Heh, guess luck wasn't on my side today{tgm}...
What?! No way! I totally could've taken you down!

name: Haruki
desc:
A young boy from Aotani Village.
Dreams of travelling the world.
fields: Ow{tgm}...{tgm} D-Don't look at me like that!|I'm not crying!

name: Taichi
desc:
A young man from Aotani Village.
Is protective of his family and neighbors.
fields: Sorry, Ma{tgm}...{tgm} I won't be coming home{tgm}...
*sigh* Looks like I've still got a long way to go.

name: Yumi
desc:
Arena fighter from Gintoki City.
Energetic and charismatic.

name: Lin
desc:
Mercenary and former member of the Medean Army.
Cold and quiet.

name: Tsurugi
desc:
Traveling merchant from Merinas.
Warm and loving.

name: Khalid
desc:
Crown prince of Fuegsol.
Loud-mouthed and cocky.

name: Reem
desc:
Khalid's retainer.
Carefree to a fault.
fields: Prince Khalid{tgm}...{tgm} I was happy{tgm}...{tgm} to serve you{tgm}...

name: Yukino
desc:
A skilled swordswoman from the Shirotori mountains.
Distrustful of men.
fields: Suno{tgm}...{tgm} Mother is coming to meet you{tgm}...

name: Masashi
desc:
Nobleman of Merinas.
Flirtatious and haughty.

name: Hikaru
desc:
Masashi's retainer.
A dedicated scholar of theology.
fields: Oh, Great Merin, let me lay peacefully upon your back{tgm}...

name: Sumire
desc:
A knight under service of Emperor Samegoro.
Takes naps often.

name: Asuka
desc:
Emperor Samegoro's retainer.
Loyal to the royal family.
fields: My only hope{tgm}...{tgm} is that my death was not in vain{tgm}...

name: Nagisa
desc:
Tsubaki's retainer.
Stubborn and blunt.

name: Tsubaki
desc:
Princess of Merinas.
Soft-spoken and peaceful.

name: Judah
desc:
Ervan's former retainer.
Strict and disciplined.
fields: I can't fall here{tgm}...{tgm} I'll retreat for now!

name: Shula
desc:
A villager from Coral Desert.
Serious, but has a soft side.

name: Kiraz
desc:
A young girl from Coral Desert.
Optimistic and a hard-worker.

name: Ervan
desc:
Crown prince of Fuegsol.
Highly curious and kindhearted.

name: Torgen
desc:
A bandit from Oregot.
Rough, but has a good heart.

name: Tora
desc:
A tiger shifter.
Strong and boisterous.

name: Estoc
desc: A golem from a bygone era.

name: Lucian
desc: Knight of House Valoria.

name: Santiago
desc: A bishop of the Order of Oreg.

name: Damien
desc:
Scholar who is an expert on the Great Beasts.
Curious, but surprisingly clumsy.
fields: Ha{tgm}...{tgm} It was only a matter of time{tgm}...

name: Bryant
desc:
King of Medeas.
A ruler with a strong sense of righteousness.

name: Thalia
desc:
Queen of Merinas.
A ruler with an aura of serenity and grace.

name: Matthew
desc:
Mysterious wanderer from a foreign continent.
Cheerful and sly.
fields: Heh, never was one for the arena anyway.

name: Altena
desc:
Mysterious wyvern rider from a foreign continent.
Honorable and dutiful.

name: Gordon
desc: Leader of the Grash Mountain bandits.

name: Beli
desc:
Gordon's second-in-command.
Cold and ruthless.

name: Iwo
desc:
Leader of the Detri bandit clan.
Greedy and sleazy.

name: Alfonso
desc:
Leader of the Yungro Bandits.
Proud of his skills and his underlings.

name: Jorge
desc: Bandit and self-proclaimed border patrol of Medregot Road.

name: Irving
desc:
Captain of the south-eastern division of Foliaga's holy knights.
Dutiful and stern.

name: Adler
desc:
General of the west division of Foliaga's Holy Knights.
A focused individual with keen senses.

name: Lorelei
desc:
General of the central division of Foliaga's Holy Knights.
Will lay down her life for the Archbishop.

name: Zeke
desc:
Captain of the Seagrave Pirates.
Proud and loud-mouthed.
fields: This ain't how it was supposed to go{tgm}...

name: Talbot
desc:
First mate of the Seagrave Pirates.
Loyal to a fault.

name: Daphne
desc:
Captain of the southeast division of Foliaga's Holy Knights.
Protective of everything she holds dear.
fields: You lot have{tgm}...{tgm} no right to{tgm}...

name: Vernon
desc:
General of the northern division of Foliaga's Holy Knights.
Has a lot of pride as a Folian.
fields: Your Excellency{tgm}...{tgm} I have{tgm}...{tgm} failed you{tgm}...

name: Peony
desc:
General of Oakenfaire's division of Holy Knights.
A devout follower of Folia.
fields: I only did{tgm}...{tgm} what I had to do{tgm}...

name: Azalea
desc:
Archbishop of Foliaga.
Is currently not herself.

name: Ferrach
desc: Mysterious bard of unknown origin.

name: Shinobu
desc:
Pirate of the Wyrmfang Pirates.
Proud to a fault.
fields: This isn't fair{tgm}...{tgm} I'm better than this! I{tgm}...!

name: Daigo
desc:
Captain of the Skullreaver Pirates.
Arrogant and crude.
fields: Wha{tgm}...{tgm} Blood{tgm}...?{tgm} How the hell did you{tgm}...

name: Keisha
desc:
Co-Captain of the Scourge Sisters.
Greedy and an opportunist.
fields: Didn't see that one coming{tgm}...{tgm} Sorry, Locke{tgm}...

name: Locke
desc:
Co-Captain of the Scourge Sisters.
Patient and cold.
fields: Looks like luck wasn't on our side today, Keisha{tgm}...

name: Yuma
desc:
Leader of the Crimson Owls.
Snarky and condescending.
fields: Guess I{tgm}...{tgm} underestimated you guys, huh{tgm}...?

name: Akira
desc:
Captain of the Crossblade Pirates.
Confident, but looks down on the weak.
fields: Damn you, Samegoro{tgm}...{tgm} You never said{tgm}...{tgm}|we'd be up against them{tgm}...!

name: Shigeo
desc:
Leader of the Wailing Zephyrs.
Tactful and merciless.
fields: Is this{tgm}...{tgm} how it all ends{tgm}...?

name: Saburo
desc:
Leader of the Riptide Pirates.
Headstrong and ruthless.

name: Hayato
desc:
Leader of the Shirotori Bandits.
Will do anything for a bit of coin.

name: Samegoro
desc:
Emperor of Merinas.
Is currently under the control of dark forces.

name: Agrona
desc:
Martial artist of unknown origin.
Soft-spoken, but hides a hidden strength.

name: Alim
desc:
A rogue of unknown origin.
Has a mysterious aura about him.
fields: Hah{tgm}...!{tgm} A pointless victory for you{tgm}...

name: Solmaz
desc:
A former bishop of Fueg.
Denounced her faith to become a follower of Circ.
fields: N-No{tgm}...!{tgm} I'll retreat for now.|Lord Milo needs to know about this.

name: Jamal
desc:
A noble of Fuegsol.
Entitled and arrogant.
fields: L-Lord Milo, Great Circ{tgm}...{tgm}|I've failed you{tgm}...

name: Gunnar
desc:
Leader of the Cragwood Bandits.
A cruel brigand who shows no mercy.

name: Milo
desc: A mysterious assassin who sticks to the shadows.

name: Vanguard
desc:
A golem from ancient times.
Protective of those he feels indebted to.

name: Sven
desc:
Soromir's subordinate.
Cunning and loyal to his liege.

name: Soromir
desc: Head of Circ's Talons.

name: Iris
desc:
High Priestess of Vergrande Monestary.
Has a gentle and motherly demeanor.
fields: Great Folia, your child is ready to feel your loving embrace{tgm}...

name: Gerolt
desc: King of Fuegsol.
fields: Argh{tgm}...! I can't{tgm}...{tgm} go down{tgm}...{tgm} like this{tgm}...

name: Leeann
desc: Queen of Fuegsol.
